get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Clients resources.

GetClientsItem.description: The `idClient` value returned in the response can be used as the `idClient` parameter in `GET /clients/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Companies resources.

GetCompaniesItem.description: The `idCompany` value returned in the response can be used as the `idCompany` parameter in `GET /companies/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of ProjectParticipation resources.

GetProjectParticipationItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /project_participations/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Project resources.

GetProjectItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /projects/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Staff resources.

GetStaffItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /staff/{id}`.

get.summary: Retrieves the collection of Tranche resources.

GetTrancheItem.description: The `id` value returned in the response can be used as the `id` parameter in `GET /tranches/{id}`.

duration.description: Duration in month. It is used to calculate the maturity date once the project is funded.

capitalPeriodicity.description: The capital repayment periodicity in month.

interestPeriodicity.description: The interest repayment periodicity in month.
